channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10438|2024-08-04T22:24:18.485Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crx%20content%20package%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin 1.8.1 and earlier allowed attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-10437|2024-08-04T22:24:18.489Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crx%20content%20package%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin 1.8.1 and earlier allowed attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-10439|2024-08-04T22:24:17.977Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crx%20content%20package%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin 1.8.1 and earlier in various 'doFillCredentialsIdItems' methods allowed users with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.
